text: Besaka alaha nu hi ki'amata da gi'ana hai ate uha hi minha var'ha'unda hai ate uha janada hai, jihara kujha garabha vica hai. Ate ko'i bada iha nahim janada ki uha kal'ha ki kama'i karega ate ko'i bada iha nahim janada ki uha kihari dharati (tham) te marega. Besaka alaha janana vala gi'ata hai
